Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.gameAction.move

Interface MoveBehavior

All Known Implementing Classes:
ApolloMoves, ArtemisMoves, AthenaMoves, MinotaurMoves, PrometheusMove, SimpleMoves
public interface MoveBehavior
Each GodCard that modify the move mechanics has to implement at least one of those methods. For example Apollo has to implement both, one for calculate the different valid moves, the last for handle the swap. Artemis doesn't need the second one because once she calculate the valid moves, the move itself is the same as the normal move. She will implement the method because it has to be, but it is never called and it is empty.
